title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - Joe Burrow on Tua TNF Scare, Kid Cudi + Week 5 Best Bets
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - Joe Burrow on Tua TNF Scare, Kid Cudi + Week 5 Best Bets
description:
This is Prime Cuts! The best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast. First, Colin explains the most surprising thing about Tom Brady and Gisele’s reported divorce, and the only NFL job that would be worth Sean Payton un-retiring to take.

Then, Bengals Quarterback Joe Burrow on how he spent his long weekend after a big TNF win over the Dolphins, how he picked his flower heavy pregame suit, his reaction to Tua Tagovailoa’s scary injury, his personal experience with concussions, what’s changed in the last two wins, what it’s like preparing for a division rival like the Ravens, how he’s maintaining a good relationship with Ja’Marr Chase despite a slow start to the year, why he decided to start his foundation to fight food insecurity, his unique relationship with Kid Cudi, and how his body feels through the first month of the season.

Finally, the Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his NFL Week 5 picks are "sharp" or "square" for Steelers/Bills, Seahawks/Saints, Falcons/Bucs, Cowboys/Rams, and Bengals/Ravens.

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd #volume #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
